## Type of change

Please delete options that are not relevant.

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing functionality to not work as expected)
- [ ] This change requires a documentation update
- [ ] Code refactor (neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature)
- [ ] Build/CI/CD related changes
- [ ] Other (please describe):

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (e.g., PEP 8 for Python).
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation (if applicable).
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings.
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works (if applicable).
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes (if applicable).
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published in downstream modules.
- [ ] I have checked that my PR is targeting the correct branch (usually `main` or `develop`).
- [ ] I have read the **CONTRIBUTING.md** document.
